default_video.scene: Shadowy industrial dungeon: cold concrete floor, massive steel beams overhead, thick heavy chains dangling, harsh white spotlights stabbing through drifting metallic haze, razor-sharp light pools on glistening sweat-slick skin and rusted metal, surrounded by deep oppressive black voids, echoing metallic clanks and strained wet breathing

default_video.audio_cues: metallic clanks and heavy chain rattle, wet grinding impacts and chest-to-chest slams, strained choking gurgles escalating to guuulk! glk! glurk!, sickening bone creaks pops and shearing tension, muffled frantic snarls and GET OFF! through bit, bubbling dying rasps and faint whistling breath, desperate failing inhalations and final catastrophic thuds

narrative_core.restraint_rule: ALL primary support, downward force, motion and escalating destruction come exclusively from heavy steel-link collars locked brutally tight around necks — no other ropes or supports bear body weight
narrative_core.escalation_arc: Safety lines snap → abrupt free-drop → initial wide arcs with explosive jerks → tempo acceleration with bone-grinding yanks → arm clamp fuses into double pendulum → peak-velocity collar yanks with maximum bone-breaking force → irreversible terminal convulsions → frozen aftermath with deep-gouged collars
narrative_core.style_directive: hyperrealistic cinematic intensity, cold steel-blue palette slashed with crimson, dramatic harsh rim lighting and deep shadows, ultra-rapid violent motion with clearly escalating tempo, explosive bone-jarring jerks, streaking blur, raw crushing erotic tension, oppressive industrial haze
